name: Pirate's Well: Salt and Echoes
description:
Coral-stone well. 7 ropes, 2 buckets, 4 coin carvings. Kassim pours rum; ripples form compass.

Riddle: "Drop silver, hear thunder—the past still drinks."

Sophisticated painterly artwork using etched-parchment technique with Seychellois cultural motifs. Part of "The Siren's Map of Praslin" cipher series.

attributes.value: VII - The Siren's Map of Praslin

advanced_specs.render_prompt: Etched parchment engraved map-card of Coral-stone well. 7 ropes, 2 buckets, 4 coin carvings. Kassim pours rum; ripples form compass.. coral_stone_ancient_weathered with rough_stone_texture_rope_detail. Dense foliage, rhythmic Seychellois motifs, saturated greens/blues/yellows. background_well_midground_ropes_foreground_kassim. Fine copperplate hatching, visible brush strokes, textured overlays. Cultural stamps: pirate_well_motifs, kassim_ex_privateer. Volumetric depth, painterly effects, living busy scene. Etched-map caption strip with gold title. 17th-century nautical chart + Seychellois modernist painting, ritualistic archaeological mood.
advanced_specs.negative_prompt: flat shapes, primitive graphics, basic fills, simple geometry, vector primitives, plain colors, childlike, cartoon, modern technology, photoreal, neon, low detail

puzzle_data.scene: Coral-stone well. 7 ropes, 2 buckets, 4 coin carvings. Kassim pours rum; ripples form compass.
puzzle_data.riddle: Drop silver, hear thunder—the past still drinks.
